description: Gaunson Creative Studios in South Tottenham, home to over 70 artist studios, will be opening its doors for the first time since 2019. Visitors will be able to meet and buy from over 50 artists across the weekend.

factsheet.heading: Gaunson Creative Open Studios
paragraphs: In its 20th year, Gaunson Creative Open Studios is taking place as part of free three day Markfield Road Festival, on 9 - 11 September 2022, on Markfield Road in South Tottenham. It will be the first time Gaunson Creative Studios will be open to the public since 2019, and visitors will be able to meet and buy from over 50 artists across the weekend.

We’re really excited to be opening our studio doors for visitors and art lovers to see behind the scenes and find out about our resident artist’s practices across ceramics, painting, film, illustration, design, fashion, photography, music and more.

factsheet.heading: Art In The Yard
paragraphs: The car park in front of the building will be transformed into Art In The Yard - a space for installations by some of our resident artists. You can join in other activities from the festival including an art raffle, panel discussions, film screenings, live music, DJs, food and drink. There are activities for the whole family to enjoy with children’s workshops and face painting.

factsheet.heading: Times and extra information
paragraphs:
We are open:
Friday 9th September, 6pm - 10pm
Saturday 10th September, 2pm - 6pm
Sunday 11th September, 2pm - 6pm

travel_info: Train: Tottenham Hale, South Tottenham, Seven Sisters

name: Gaunson Creative Open Studios as part of Markfield Road Festival 2022
